P1.title: Xbox Elite
P1.detail: Xbox Elite Wireless Controller Black Color
desc: Enhance your aiming with new adjustable-tension thumbsticks and stay on target with a wrap-around rubberized grip
Tailor the controller to your preferred gaming style with new interchangeable thumbstick and paddle shapes
Save up to 3 custom profiles and 1 default profile on the controller
Assign a button to act as a ‘Shift key’ to enable alternative inputs for each of the other buttons

review.name: Elon Musk
review.title: My Best Purchase yet!
review.review: Amazing controller, has all the features required for console gaming. Light weight and looks very sleek and stunning.

P2.title: Logitech G213 Prodigy Gaming Keyboard
P2.detail: LIGHTSYNC RGB Backlit Keys, Spill-Resistant, Customizable Keys, Dedicated Multi-Media Keys - Black
desc: Brilliant Color Spectrum Illumination Personalize five individual lighting zones from a spectrum of over 16.8 million colors
Comfortable and Durable G213 Prodigy is a full-sized keyboard designed for gaming and productivity
G213 features dedicated media controls that can be used to play, pause and mute music and videos instantly
Customize lighting, game mode and macro custom programming with downloadable Logitech G HUB software

review.name: Adron James
review.title: Enhanced my movement
review.review: Amazing Keyboard, has all the features required for good movement in gaming. Light weight and looks very sleek and stunning.

P3.title: RAZER - BLACKSHARK V2 PRO
P3.detail: Six Siege Special Edition Gaming Headphones
desc: FEATURING RAZER HYPERSPEED WIRELESS TECHNOLOGY
FEATURING 50MM RAZER TRIFORCE TITANIUM DRIVERS
ULTRACLEAR SUPERCARDIOID MICROPHONE
THX SPATIAL AUDIO - FOR IMMERSIVE GAMING AUDIO EXPERIENCE AND OFFERING MEMORY FOAM EAR CUSHIONS AND PASSIVE NOISE CANCELLATION

review.name: Josh Ambers
review.title: My Best pair of headphones yet!
review.review: Amazing Sound, has all the features required for competetive gaming. Looks very cool and amazing.

P4.title: G502 HERO
desc: G502 HERO features HERO 25K gaming sensor with sub-micron precision tracking, customizable LIGHTSYNC RGB, onboard profiles, repositionable weights
Adjustable Weight System
Mechanical Switch Button Tensioning
Assign a button to act as a ‘Shift key’ to enable dpi shifts for each of the other buttons

review.name: Elisa Mittens
review.title: Very high speed mouse
review.review: Amazing grip, has all the features required for a good aim. Light weight and looks very sleek and stunning.

P5.title: Elgato Stream Deck XL
P5.detail: Advanced Stream Control with 32 customizable LCD keys
desc: Seamlessly integrated Elgato Game Capture, OBS, Streamlabs, Twitch, YouTube, Twitter, Mixer, and more
Completely customizable Personalizing Stream Deck XL is a breeze
Your streaming centerpiece Start streaming. Adjust audio levels and mute your mic. Tweak lighting. Switch cameras. Apply lower thirds. Change scenes
Easily customize 32 LCD keys to trigger unlimited actions

review.name: Figer Thaw
review.title: High quality streaming aid
review.review: Comfy switch, has all the features required for a good aim. Light weight and looks very sleek and stunning.
